column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I was in town for a night and looking for a steakhouse to try. I saw good reviews + their very attractive looking food so I decided to go there without a reservation. I was there on Sunday night so it was a little slower. I got a seat at the bar and really enjoyed everything from the atmosphere
column5: and even people who sat to me visiting from out of town. Drinks are well made. My toasted bone marrow and 22 oz. dried-age ribeye is soooo tender
column7: and perfectly seasoned. I gotta say this is the best steak I have had in my life ... I know I may have said this more than once about steak somewhere else but you don't stop eating lol...hopefully when I return to Chicago
column8: they will keep the quality the way it is now.
